features: Revita Hair Density Shampoo: Revita is created with top dermatologists and formulated with key and effective ingredients that act against breakage and excess shedding while supporting thicker, fuller, healthier-looking hair. By combining ingredients like DHT Blocker caffeine, Biotin, antioxidants, hydrating molecules, and amino acids, Revita delivers an effective shampoo to support hair density and help increase volume.
Who is Revita Shampoo For: Men and women who are concerned about thinning and excess shedding. Revita Shampoo is safe for all hair types and textures and can be used on color-treated hair.

What It Does: Revita improves the look, feel, and texture of your hair. From the first use you will notice hair feels healthier, thicker, and has more volume. Revita works to not only support hair density, but to strengthen hair from the root to prevent future breakage and give you your healthiest hair yet.

Suggested Use: Massage Revita Shampoo into wet hair. Leave on for 2 minutes and rinse. For the best results use 5x per week in combination with Revita Conditioner. Most users can see results within 90 days of consistent use with optimal results seen within 120 days. Results may vary.

Nanosome Technology: DS Laboratories formulas feature our proprietary Nanosome Technology. This technology allows for the continuous release of the active ingredients creating higher efficacy with longer lasting results.
body.description: *New packaging, same proven formula*Equal parts hair and scalp care, Revita is equipped with a breakthrough complex that revolutionizes the functionality of a premium shampoo and is designed to enhance density while helping to improve hair quality. This high-tech formulation incorporates powerful amino acids, proteins and botanicals and is an optimal daily shampoo for anyone who wants better, thicker, fuller looking hair. For all hair types. Revita gently cleanses while delivering powerful stimulation that strengthens hair and boosts performance. By removing impurities from the scalp ﬁrst, key ingredients are delivered to fortify and redensify hair strands from within—resulting in fuller, stronger, healthier looking hair.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Who we are We are a different kind of personal care company, one that continuously innovates and develops high-tech products that are designed to exceed our customer’s expectations. Our state-of-the-art biotech-powered products are trusted by top dermatologists around the world to deliver youth, radiance, and performance. Our promise is a commitment to excellence and a passion for developing best in class formulations that make a meaningful difference in the lives of our customers. Redensifying - Anti-Thinning - Fortifying Hair Stimulating Shampoo With Redensifying Complex For Thinning Hair Equal parts hair and scalp care, Revita revolutionizes shampoo. It gently cleanses while delivering powerful stimulation that strengthens hair, maximizes hair count, enhances length, boosts density and improves overall hair quality. This advanced science formulation incorporates caffeine, amino acids, proteins and botanicals and is an optimal daily shampoo for anyone who wants better, thicker, fuller, healthier looking hair. Researched and recommended by dermatologists, Revita is suitable for all hair types and safe for color-treated hair. Sulfate- and paraben- free. Provides complete support for both healthy and thinning hair Promotes hair stimulation Improves hair density and volume Increases speed of hair growth Strengthens hair and reduces hair fallout Cleanses scalp and hair

An Intelligent Cosmetic: Nanosomes DS Laboratories products feature our proprietary Nanosome Delivery System for the encapsulation and continuous release of active ingredients. This system delivers higher efficacy and longer lasting results. Bio-degradable 100% recyclable packaging & oxo-biodegradable bottle; Made in USA Key Actives: Biotin, taurine, copper peptides, caffeine, spin traps, cysteine, rooibos tea, apple polyphenols, emu oil and MSM. Formulated Without: Parabens, sulfates, phthalates and harsh chemicals. Keep it Real – Beware of Diverters This product comes direct from the manufacturer: its quality, safety and purity are all guaranteed. Authentic DS Labs products are unexpired, unaltered and unadulterated. Only authentic products can be trusted as 100% genuine.

Recommended by Top Dermatologists Worldwide World-renowned Physician, Dermatologist, and Scientist Dr. Antonella Tosti is DS Labs’ resident Medical Advisor. Dr. Tosti is an Italian physician and scientist responsible for groundbreaking contributions in the field of dermatology. Bringing her authority as the industry’s most vocal supporter of commercial and consumer advancements, Dr. Tosti’s advisory and research collaboration enable DS Laboratories to remain at the forefront of hair care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS REVITA SHAMPOO
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I wrote a review on these 2 products once before, but since I REALLY LOVE using both of these 2 " REVITA " products SO MUCH, I wanted to write another review to let EVERYONE know, that both of these 2 " REVITA " products are " BY FAR THE ABSOLUTE BEST PRODUCTS ON THE MARKET ", for hair loss. I have been using both of these 2 products for a few months now & I couldn't be more thrilled, pleased, happy or amazed with how these 2 products has really helped my hair, because I have always had some kind of hair loss or hair breakage most of my life, as we all do, then after I got really sick last year, I started to see that my hair was REALLY coming out a great deal, to where my hair would come out in hand fulls, every time I would wash or brush my hair, but since I started using both of these 2 " REVITA " products together over several months, I started to see less & less hair loss & less hair breakage after each time of washing my hair & NOW " I HAVE ABSOLUTE NO KIND OF HAIR LOSS OR HAIR BREAKAGE AT ALL " & I indeed have these 2 " REVITA " products to thank for saving my hair, because of these 2 " REVITA " products that I have pictured with this update review, my hair loss & hair breakage has completely STOPPED altogether & All hair loss or hair breakage that I did have in the pass is NO MORE & you can be rest assured that this will be the only " REVITA " Shampoo & Conditioner that I will ever use from now on, so if you suffer from ANY KIND of hair loss or hair breakage at all, like I did & you have tried everything on the market, then you really need to give both of these 2 " REVITA " products a try, because you won't be at all sorry that you did. How I use the " REVITA " shampoo, is washing my hair at least twice, with each time, really scrubbing & working it through my hair for at least a minute or so, then rinsing after each shampoo, then & use the " REVITA " Conditioner " after the second shampoo, I put some of the " REVITA " Conditioner in my hand, then applying it all over my hair, scrubbing & working it all over & through out my hair for about a minute or so, then I leave the "REVITA " Conditioner on my hair for about 5 more minutes, because I REALLY LOVE the really cool feeling that it makes my hair, head & scape feel, then after leaving the REVITA " Conditioner on my hair for 5 minutes, I wash the Conditioner out, towel dry my hair, then brush my hair, then after that & just let my hair air dry. Now you will might not see immediate results after the first time from using both the " REVITA Shampoo & REVITA Conditioner " but " DON'T GET DISCOURAGED or FRUSTRATED " because you will, especially if you keep using both of these 2 products for a few months, you will indeed see the very same results as I have & experienced, because like I said before after using the " REVITA Shampoo & REVITA Conditioner " together I have " ABSOLUTE NO KIND OF HAIR LOSS ANY MORE OR NO KIND OF HAIR BREAKAGE AT ALL NOW " & I couldn't be more thrilled, happy or amazed, because both of these 2 " REVITA " products do EXACTLY what they say they would do & to me, knowing that I spent my money on something or a product(s) that REALLY, REALLY WORKS, is just some of the best money that I have EVER spent.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work for me
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo works for me. Every morning when I take a shower, I see a lot of hair in the bathtub drain, but after using this shampoo, I don't see any more hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works good ! Less hair loss !
reviews.reviewText: Does not suds up as much as I would like . However I’ve used other products that claim great results for limiting hair loss . I’m happier with this product as it works much better . I used to be able to pull out a hand full of hair just by gently running my fingers through my hair …. After using this product that has now dramatically improved and reduced my hair loss .

reviews.reviewText: This stuff smell great and penetrates deep in the scalp

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good product- horrible bottle design
reviews.reviewText: Good product- horrible packaging. Can’t just toss this product in your toiletry bag or suitcase because the design of the pump that delivers the shampoo requires complicated twisting to lock into place and even then the bottle typically leaks shampoo all over everything. The last bottle design leaked and the new design leaks as well. Probability won’t order again but if I do, I’ll pour the shampoo out of the bottle into a $.50 cheap plastic container. You’d think this company could get the bottle designing part down better!

reviews.reviewText: I use to use this brand, but I found the packaging was doesn’t really good, product always leaking. Now unordered again, because the new packaging. But what I received the product is the old packaging.
Al parecer fortifica el cabello . Ayuda bastante. No te va a salir una peluca por usarlo 3 meses ten paciencia

I have been using this brand for last 3 years. I used to have bad dandruff issue. Which was contributing to my hair fall partly as well. As soon as i started applying this one 5 days a week, dandruff was reduced by 90% and till date i am using it 3 times a week as a continuation. And can't say it helped much with hair growth directly but my hairline is still holding.
